<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RC == &amp;NVPTX::Int128RegsRegClass)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.b128&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RC == &amp;NVPTX::Int64RegsRegClass)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We use untyped (.b) integer registers here as NVCC does.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Correctness of generated code does not depend on register type,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// but using .s/.u registers runs into ptxas bug that prevents</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// assembly of otherwise valid PTX into SASS. Despite PTX ISA</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// specifying only argument size for fp16 instructions, ptxas does</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not allow using .s16 or .u16 arguments for .fp16</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions. At the same time it allows using .s32/.u32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// arguments for .fp16v2 instructions:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   .reg .b16 rb16</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   .reg .s16 rs16</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   add.f16 rb16,rb16,rb16; // OK</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   add.f16 rs16,rs16,rs16; // Arguments mismatch for instruction &#39;add&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// but:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   .reg .b32 rb32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   .reg .s32 rs32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   add.f16v2 rb32,rb32,rb32; // OK</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   add.f16v2 rs32,rs32,rs32; // OK</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.b64&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  debugRegisterMap.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147" lineLink="#aab8b72686fab99a218789ee582f09c6b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#aab8b72686fab99a218789ee582f09c6b">encodeRegisterForDwarf</a>(std::string registerName) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (registerName.length() &gt; 8) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The name is more than 8 characters long, and so won&#39;t fit into 64 bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Encode the name string into a DWARF register number using cuda-gdb&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// encoding.  See cuda&#95;check&#95;dwarf2&#95;reg&#95;ptx&#95;virtual&#95;register in cuda-tdep.c,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// https://github.com/NVIDIA/cuda-gdb/blob/e5cf3bddae520ffb326f95b4d98ce5c7474b828b/gdb/cuda/cuda-tdep.c#L353</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// IE the bytes of the string are concatenated in reverse into a single</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// number, which is stored in ULEB128, but in practice must be no more than 8</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bytes (excluding null terminator, which is not included).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t result = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> c : registerName)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    result = (result &lt;&lt; 8) | c;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxregisterinfo/#a6b4972eff902518ef535018579cf0bb7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxregisterinfo/#a6b4972eff902518ef535018579cf0bb7">NVPTXRegisterInfo::addToDebugRegisterMap</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t preEncodedVirtualRegister, std::string registerName)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t mapped = <a href="#aab8b72686fab99a218789ee582f09c6b">encodeRegisterForDwarf</a>(registerName);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (mapped == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">  debugRegisterMap.insert(&#123;preEncodedVirtualRegister, mapped&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxregisterinfo/#ae271370eae878e78d2bad43aa2d68e1d"><Highlight kind="normal">int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxregisterinfo/#ae271370eae878e78d2bad43aa2d68e1d">NVPTXRegisterInfo::getDwarfRegNum</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> RegNum, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isEH)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RegNum.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister/#adab6a6e130a565c2cb11ef465fac90e7">isPhysical</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::string <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/smeabipass-cpp/#a8f8f80d37794cde9472343e4487ba3eb">name</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxinstprinter/#aa021e0896ced10e79b81454e4186a7f2">NVPTXInstPrinter::getRegisterName</a>(RegNum.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister/#af8403cc977c65b910e618ebcb6a12c32">id</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In NVPTXFrameLowering.cpp, we do arrange for %Depot to be accessible from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %SP. Using the %Depot register doesn&#39;t provide any debug info in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cuda-gdb, but switching it to %SP does.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RegNum.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister/#af8403cc977c65b910e618ebcb6a12c32">id</a>() == NVPTX::VRDepot)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/smeabipass-cpp/#a8f8f80d37794cde9472343e4487ba3eb">name</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;%SP&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#aab8b72686fab99a218789ee582f09c6b">encodeRegisterForDwarf</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/smeabipass-cpp/#a8f8f80d37794cde9472343e4487ba3eb">name</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/gsym/inlineinfo-cpp/#a5db99f4b7f8744e0b1c8b50dba8ec5a2">lookup</a> = debugRegisterMap.lookup(RegNum.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister/#af8403cc977c65b910e618ebcb6a12c32">id</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/gsym/inlineinfo-cpp/#a5db99f4b7f8744e0b1c8b50dba8ec5a2">lookup</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/gsym/inlineinfo-cpp/#a5db99f4b7f8744e0b1c8b50dba8ec5a2">lookup</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
